text: Shaun Anthony Linford Wallace (born 2 June 1960) is an English barrister, lecturer and television personality. He is most famous for being a "Chaser" on the ITV British quiz show The Chase. Wallace is a part-time lecturer and visit schools, colleges and other institutions to educate students on aspects of law. In 2004, he won Mastermind and was ranked 286th in the World Quizzing Champions in 2012. Wallace was born in London, England. Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:British television personalities Category:English barristers
title: Shaun Wallace
